hackathon-description-text: RevolutionUC prides itself on being the premiere student run Hackathon at the University of Cincinnati. At RevolutionUC you'll find an intimate working environment filled with like-minded students seeking innovation and problem solving. Because of this natural curiosity cultivated at RevolutionUC time and time again, our slogan is "Build. Learn. Grow"

hackathon-judges.judge-role: SVP and CIO of IT Strategy and Architecture

hackathon-rules:
RevolutionUC follows the Hack Code of Conduct, as well as the MLH Code of Conduct. For more information please visit the following sources for these rules:
http://hackcodeofconduct.org/
https://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf
 

For your presentations, you may use your own laptop. There will be both mini-display port and VGA hookups, and a computer with a web browser if needbe.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team with the best use of IBM Watson IoT Bluemix receives apple watches!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of IBM Watson IoT Bluemix

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team with the best college themed hack wins a UC themed prize.
The team with the most popular hack (votes cast by our hackers) will receive quadcopters!
The high school team with the best hack will win a surprise prize.
The team with the best user interface hack will receive Chromebooks
The team with the best device privacy hack wins a collector's edition copy of Watch Dogs 2, Collectors Edition courtesy of Ubisoft.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team demonstrating the best use of Amazon Web Services wins 1TB portable hard drives.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of Amazon Web Services

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team utilizing the "punniest" domain name registered with your Domain.com coupon wins domain.com swag bags and sparkfun redboards.
This challenge has a $200 cash award. To see the terms of the consumer challenge please see this link:

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: A rating from 1-5 will be given
